body:
<!-- **Are you in the right place?**
1. For issues or feature requests, please create an issue in this repository.
2. For general technical and non-technical questions, we are happy to help you on our [Rook.io Slack](https://slack.rook.io/).
3. Did you already search the existing open issues for anything similar? -->

**Is this a bug report or feature request?**
* Bug Report

**Deviation from expected behavior:**
When upgrading from Nautilus to Octopus it is expected that all of the daemons will be updated. However, the rgw and mds daemons were not seen to upgrade.

```
[root@rook-ceph-tools-7f96779fb9-65kpp /]# ceph versions
{
    "mon": {
        "ceph version 15.2.0 (dc6a0b5c3cbf6a5e1d6d4f20b5ad466d76b96247) octopus (rc)": 3
    },
    "mgr": {
        "ceph version 15.2.0 (dc6a0b5c3cbf6a5e1d6d4f20b5ad466d76b96247) octopus (rc)": 1
    },
    "osd": {
        "ceph version 15.2.0 (dc6a0b5c3cbf6a5e1d6d4f20b5ad466d76b96247) octopus (rc)": 3
    },
    "mds": {
        "ceph version 14.2.8 (2d095e947a02261ce61424021bb43bd3022d35cb) nautilus (stable)": 2
    },
    "rgw": {
        "ceph version 14.2.8 (2d095e947a02261ce61424021bb43bd3022d35cb) nautilus (stable)": 1
    },
    "overall": {
        "ceph version 14.2.8 (2d095e947a02261ce61424021bb43bd3022d35cb) nautilus (stable)": 3,
        "ceph version 15.2.0 (dc6a0b5c3cbf6a5e1d6d4f20b5ad466d76b96247) octopus (rc)": 7
    }
}
```

Notice that the pod running times for mds and rgw are much longer than mon/mgr/osd since the mds/rgw were not restarted during the upgrade.
```
NAME                                                 READY   STATUS      RESTARTS   AGE
csi-cephfsplugin-k5jbx                               3/3     Running     0          15m
csi-cephfsplugin-provisioner-674847b584-84fvh        5/5     Running     0          15m
csi-cephfsplugin-provisioner-674847b584-cgxbh        5/5     Running     0          15m
csi-rbdplugin-provisioner-5777f9cf96-46r8n           6/6     Running     0          15m
csi-rbdplugin-provisioner-5777f9cf96-xlfkb           6/6     Running     0          15m
csi-rbdplugin-smfbb                                  3/3     Running     0          15m
rook-ceph-crashcollector-minikube-575b868679-vcfck   1/1     Running     0          7m7s
rook-ceph-mds-myfs-a-dfddc7968-9bjfv                 1/1     Running     0          14m
rook-ceph-mds-myfs-b-544c8697dd-dj4q9                1/1     Running     0          14m
rook-ceph-mgr-a-58dfd7955c-ktbkj                     1/1     Running     0          6m19s
rook-ceph-mon-a-f957d77b-jxmwf                       1/1     Running     0          6m56s
rook-ceph-mon-b-79499ff9dd-6hck9                     1/1     Running     0          6m36s
rook-ceph-mon-c-6b66c7568-m25q5                      1/1     Running     0          7m7s
rook-ceph-operator-678887c8d-wk5wc                   1/1     Running     0          15m
rook-ceph-osd-0-5cbf97db84-dflnk                     1/1     Running     0          5m41s
rook-ceph-osd-1-6dd449dc64-2kjj9                     1/1     Running     0          5m26s
rook-ceph-osd-2-596c68798b-dwvkb                     1/1     Running     0          5m6s
rook-ceph-osd-prepare-minikube-fjjm4                 0/1     Completed   0          5m51s
rook-ceph-rgw-my-store-a-746f45899f-cdrg9            1/1     Running     0          14m
rook-ceph-tools-7f96779fb9-65kpp                     1/1     Running     0          20m
rook-discover-fgbcg                                  1/1     Running     0          15m
```

**Expected behavior:**
All daemons are expected to upgrade to Octopus when requested.

**How to reproduce it (minimal and precise):**
<!-- Please let us know any circumstances for reproduction of your bug. -->
- Install the latest Rook cluster with the default to install Nautilus v14.2.8
- Upgrade to Octopus: `kubectl -n rook-ceph edit CephCluster rook-ceph`, then modify the ceph image to `ceph/ceph:v15.2.0`
- Wait for the daemons to upgrade
- RGW and MDS don't get upgraded. Their controllers don't appear to notice the change. After the update there are no messages from their controllers in the operator log.
title: MDS and RGW daemons were not upgraded from Nautilus to Octopus
